formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Regular hexagon basics Perimeter: \(P = 6a\) Area: \(A = \frac{3\sqrt{3}}{2} a^2\) Apothem (inradius): \(r = \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} a\) Circumradius: \(R = a\) Flat-to-flat width (distance between opposite sides): \(w = 2r = \sqrt{3} a\) Point-to-point height (distance between opposite vertices): \(h = 2R = 2a\) From area to side: \(a = \sqrt{\frac{2A}{3\sqrt{3}}}\) Hexagonal prism volume (base = regular hex): \(V = A \cdot h_{prism}\)
